intro.description: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of adding activities and transitions to your process definition.

item.title: Adding the Activities
item.description:
1. In the diagrams toolbar palette select Activity (expand Items).
2. Choose the activity type Application.
3. Place the activity box on the diagram canvas.
4. Open the properties dialog with a double-click.
5. Enter the name Init Data.

item.title: Creating Transitions between Activities
item.description:
Having created the activities, define their sequence and transitions, so that they form a directed graph:
1. In the diagram toolbar palette, select Connect.
2. Click the predecessor activity first.
3. Click the subsequent activity after.
